name: 吳昭正
objective: 布林代數與邏輯閘，組合邏輯，算術演算邏輯，同步循序邏輯，演繹狀態機，非同步循序邏輯。
schedule:
Week 1(9/9、10). Introduction 
Week 2(9/16、17). Number systems、Holiday
Week 3(9/23、24). Boolean Algebra (I) 
Week 4(9/30、10/1). Boolean Algebra (II) & Applications of Boolean algebra minterm and maxterm expansions (I)
Week 5(10/7、8). Holiday; Applications of Boolean algebra minterm and maxterm expansions (II)
Week 6(10/14、15). Karnaugh Maps (I)
Week 7(10/21、22). Karnaugh Maps (II)
Week 8(10/28、29). Quine-McClusky Method 
Week 9(11/4、5). Midterm Exam
Week 10(11/11、12). Multi-Level Gate Circuits NAND and NOR Gates
Week 11(11/18、19). Combinational Circuit Design and Simulation Using Gates
Week 12(11/25、26). Multiplexers, Decoders, and Programmable Logic Devices (I)
Week 13(12/2、3). Multiplexers, Decoders, and Programmable Logic Devices (II)
Week 14(12/9、10). Latches and Flip-Flops (I)
Week 15(12/16、17). Latches and Flip-Flops (II)
Week 16(12/23、24). Registers and Counters (I)
Week 17(12/30、31). Registers and Counters (II)
Week 18(1/6、7). Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Homework exams 30%
Midterm 30%
Final 30%
Attendance 10%
Class Participation 10%
materials: Fundamentals of Logic Design Enhanced, 7th Edition, by Charles H. Roth, Jr. , Larry L. Kinney , Eugene B. John, Pearson FT Press, 2020
